page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: I am very interested in religion in our area since my grandfather, grandmother and I are all pentecostalists. We meet on a Sunday in Dewsbury. We have bread and wine at communion and we also sing about three songs. One boy in my class is a mormon. He cannot drink tea or coffee because it has caffeine in it. The services are 3 hours long. 5 people in my class are church of England they take communion and sing hymns the services last an hour before they go home. I carried out a survey in school and found that most children were C of E, 3 were Catholics and 18 Methodists 30 children out of 300 go to church every week,36 five times a year.
